actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the disposal of various materials from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to dispose of various materials from the national stockpile, and the supplemental stockpile States that the time and method of disposition shall be fixed with due regard to the protection of the United States against avoidable loss and the protection of producers, processors, and consumers against avoidable disruption of their usual markets.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the disposal of various materials from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile, and for other purposes.
